## Matrix4x4.scale() method

Scales a Matrix4x4 by a scalar number component-wise.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static scale(a: Matrix4x4, f: number, result?: Matrix4x4): Matrix4x4;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  a | [Matrix4x4](doc/markdown/./base.matrix4x4.md) | The matrix to be scaled. |
|  f | number | The scalar number. |
|  result | [Matrix4x4](doc/markdown/./base.matrix4x4.md) | _(Optional)_ The output matrix (can be the same as a), if not specified, a new matrix will be created. |

**Returns:**

[Matrix4x4](doc/markdown/./base.matrix4x4.md)

The output matrix
